summary: This module implements a Vulkan SPIR-V code generator that traverses high‑level shader abstract syntax trees and emits SPIR-V modules. It handles declaration of constants, types, globals, and functions, and translates statements such as assignments, control flow, and expressions while managing unique IDs and type mappings.
business_intent: Enable automatic conversion of high‑level shader code into Vulkan‑compatible SPIR-V binaries, serving as a backend for shader translation tools and facilitating integration of custom shaders into Vulkan graphics pipelines.
